PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-04062010-03-25,  DFAIT,  ,  , 
SubjectInternational Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships, 1973, as modified by the Protocol of 1978 relating thereto (MARPOL 73/78); Annex IV: Regulations for the Prevention of Pollution by Sewage from Ships
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to bring into force for Canada the International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships, 1973, as modified by the Protocol of 1978 relating thereto (MARPOL 73/78); ANNEX IV: REGULATIONS FOR THE PREVENTION OF POLLUTION BY SEWAGE FROM SHIPS.
AttachmentsAttachment
